chatbot.evidence: The complaint mentions a chatbot named TOBI.
chatbot.description: The customer is complaining about the inability to speak to a real person at Vodacom helpline and the frustration caused by the chatbot TOBI.
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot's functionality and provide an option for customers to speak to a real person for assistance.

complaint.description: The customer is unable to access their email for 7 days and finds it frustrating to deal with the chatbot instead of a real person.
complaint.suggestion: Ensure prompt resolution of email access issues and improve customer care by providing access to real person support.

meta.review_content: Have you ever tried to speak to a real person at Vodacom helpline. It is impossible you go round and round in circles with their stupid BOT called TOBI. Unable to access my email for 7 days it happens often. No customer care here!
